sources.title: Suicide Squad
sources.description: A young fireman hot-shot publicity hound is shunned by his peers until his reckless courage saves the day.

metadata.Plot: Young firefighter Larry Parker's daring exploits have garner him much newspaper publicity which has promptly gone to his head. His fire-department colleagues and his sweetheart Mary O'Connor start to shun him, thinking that he is just a publicity hound. But his daring rescue of Mary and her younger brother Mickey from a blazing inferno shows that he is a true hero to all.
metadata.Writer: Charles E. Roberts, Ray Nazarro, Homer King Gordon
metadata.Actors: Norman Foster, Joyce Compton, Robert Homans
